contentrichtext.text: {{For|places in Poland|Zdrój (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox film | name = Zdroj | director = [[Martin Mareček]] | writer = [[Martin Mareček]], [[Martin Skalský]] | producer = [[Barbora Fabiánová]], [[Vratislav Slajer]] | cinematography = [[Jiří Málek]] | distributor = [[Bionaut Films]] | released = April 29, 2005 | runtime = 77 min | language = [[Czech language|Czech]], [[Azerbaijani language|Azerbaijani]] }} '''''Zdroj''''' ('''''Source''''') is a 2005 [[Cinema of the Czech Republic|Czech documentary]] directed by [[Martin Mareček]] and written by Martin Mareček and [[Martin Skalský]]. The film explores the [[civil rights]] abuses by the [[Ilham Aliyev]] regime of [[Azerbaijan]] during the construction of the [[Baku-Tbilisi-Ceyhan pipeline]], such as [[eminent domain]] violations in appropriating land for the pipeline's route, and criticism of the government leading to arrest. ==External links== *[http://www.automatfilm.cz Official website] of Zdroj *{{IMDb title | id=0464341 | title= Zdroj}} * {{Amg movie|334315|Zdroj}} *[http://www.variety.com/review/VE1117927708.html?categoryid=31&cs=1&p=0 Variety review of Zdroj] *[http://filmref.com/journal/archives/2006/06/source_2006.html Strictly Film School review] [[Category:2005 films]] [[Category:Czech-language films]] [[Category:Azerbaijani-language films]] [[Category:Czech documentary films]] [[Category:Documentary films about human rights]] [[Category:2000s documentary films]] [[Category:Czech films]] {{poli-documentary-film-stub}} {{CzechRepublic-film-stub}}
